items.sentence: Tom didn\'t think Mary would eat what he made for her.
Tom almost always does what he says he\'s going to do.
What makes you so sure that Tom will be here tomorrow?
What room in your house do you spend the most time in?
I was surprised when Tom told me he needed to do that.
I began to study French when I was thirteen years old.
Tom admitted he had done what he was accused of doing.
Do you think anyone will care if Tom doesn\'t do that?
Tom did eventually tell me something I needed to know.
The actual price was lower than I thought it would be.
Tom doesn\'t need to read this if he doesn\'t want to.
It\'s been almost three months since I\'ve moved here.
It\'s obvious that Tom knows what he\'s talking about.
Do you think it would be better to write Tom a letter?
Tom\'s parents are much stricter than Mary\'s parents.
Tom didn\'t know the reason why Mary didn\'t like him.
The crowd was cheering as Tom crossed the finish line.
Tom arrived three hours late and that made Mary angry.
Tom asked Mary not to wear her red dress to the opera.
Tom isn\'t just my brother. He\'s my best friend, too.
